mapper.select: SELECT d.store_name storeName, CONCAT(e.area_name,f.area_name,g.area_name,d.address) address, c.goods_name goodsName, c.goods_price goodsPrice, c.goods_image_path goodsImagePath, b.goods_count cartGoodsCount, b.goods_id goodsId, a.order_all_cost orderAllCost, a.order_all_goods_count orderAllGoodsCount, a.order_id orderId, a.create_time crateTime, a.order_state_id orderStateId FROM t_info_order a LEFT JOIN t_info_order_deepen b ON b.order_id = a.order_id LEFT JOIN t_info_goods c ON c.goods_id = b.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_info_store d ON a.store_id = d.store_id LEFT JOIN t_info_area_level e ON e.area_id = d.province_id LEFT JOIN t_info_area_level f ON f.area_id = d.city_id LEFT JOIN t_info_area_level g ON g.area_id = d.area_id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 AND a.order_id = #{orderId}
